title: 漫画堆
ThirdReadModeXpath: function getChapterImage(filename,chapterPath) {         var host = "https://mhcdn.manhuazj.com";         if (filename === undefined) return host + '/images/default/common.png';                  if (filename.match(/^https?:\/\/(images.dmzj.com|imgsmall.dmzj.com)/i)) return 'http://222.186.43.94/showImage.php?url='+encodeURI(filename); if (filename.match(/^[a-z]\//i)) return 'http://222.186.43.94/showImage.php?url='+encodeURI("https://images.dmzj.com/"+filename);         if (filename.match(/^(http:|https:|ftp:|^)\/\//i)) return filename;         filename = chapterPath.trim('/') + '/' + filename;         return host + '/' + filename;     }  function getQZImgList(){     var key = "123456781234567G";     var iv = "ABCDEF1G34123412";     var isgbk = "0";      eval(html.match(/var chapterImages.*chapterPath = "([^"]*?)";/)[0]);      var decryptedStr= Jaes(chapterImages,key,iv,isgbk);  chapterImages = JSON.parse(decryptedStr.toString()); if(chapterImages[0].substr(0,4)=='http') { return chapterImages; } return chapterImages.map(function(image){ return getChapterImage(image,chapterPath); }); }
